20101230154244.000|20101230154246.000|TR0|headache, if that's sort of your major 
20101230154246.000|20101230154248.000|TR0|symptom, those will help.  However, if 
20101230154248.000|20101230154251.000|TR0|it's more an upset stomach, if that's more 
20101230154251.000|20101230154253.000|TR0|what you're feeling, these might irritate 
20101230154253.000|20101230154255.000|TR0|the stomach.  So, be careful.
20101230154255.000|20101230154257.000|TR0|

20101230154300.000|20101230154302.000|TR0|this one but some people might take a cup
